item.description: Hey everyone!!  three week check in!!  Please do not respond here yes or no just let me know directly.  If you say you are not coming Sat night on here you will be out of the 30 day group.  I am just announcing the get together here because some of the people that have signed up for the 30 day have left no email access.  Sorry to the people not involved in the group.  Meetup does not give me an option to include only those already involved.  I will have some goodies for us :)  KO

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: 30 Days Raw Plus Challenge!!!! Check In!!
